original_text: Now as he went on his way, he approached Damascus, and suddenly a light from heaven shone around him.
korean_text: 사울이 길을 가다가 다메섹에 가까이 이르더니 홀연히 하늘로부터 빛이 그를 둘러 비추는지라

sentences.original_text: Now as he went on his way
suddenly a light from heaven shone around him
sentences.korean_translation: 갑자기 하늘의 빛이 그를 둘러 비췄다
